attributes.action: help with heating costs for the disabled.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People with Multiple Sclerosis are quite often housebound, and need extra heat. As we are unable to work, the cost of this extra heating is often too much. This is no good, when we NEED this.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "help with heating costs for the disabled."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17392
